CustomField.formula: IF( CaseNumber != "", "Case Number: " + CaseNumber + BR(), "") + IF( SuppliedEmail != "", "Email: " + SuppliedEmail + BR(), "") + IF( Account.customer_number__c !="", "Customer Number: " + Account.customer_number__c + BR(), "") + IF( IsStopped = TRUE, "Stopped Until: " + TEXT(stopped_until__c) , "")
CustomField.label: Case Info
